title: Wayfair | SDE-2 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: B.Tech in CS From NIT
Years of Experience: 3.5
Prior Experience: SWE at PhonePe
Prev Comp : 28L Fixed + Esops 7L annually
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: Wayfair
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 42L Fixed (40 Basic + 2 PF)
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 42L
Benefits: Gym membership & Insurance 
Other details: HR was very strict about the offer and it was non-negotiable.

*Interview Experience here :* https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/6034823/Wayfair-or-SDE2-or-Bengaluru-or-Nov-2024-Offer

title: Walmart | IN3 | oct 2024
content:
College: Tier 3
Education: B.E in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 3 years
Current Organization: SWE at service based org
Current Compensation: 14 LPA CTC ( 12 fixed including PF + 2 variable )
Date of the Offer: 31 oct , 2024
Company: Walmart
Title/Level: SDE 3
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 18 LPA ( Base ) + 84.4k ( retrials/PF)
Signing Bonus: none
Stock bonus: 4.5 LPA ; vesting is quarterly over 3-4 years ; i hear its also dependent on manager and not mandatory that you will get
Variable/Performance pay : 3.4 LPA
Total comp (Salary + Variable + Stock): ~ ~26.7 LPA overall.
Benefits: Standard Walmart Benefits


Verdict: This seems to be a lowball offer ,  have another offer in hand but its not of senior level per my experience.
